nodes.text: A Partisan cell led by the Devaronian Blue was active in the Five Points system in the Outer Rim Territories. The Labbo junk trader Risi Amps hired Jyn Erso as forger to forge cargo manifests and clearance codes, allowing the cell to bypass Imperial blockades.

Imperial Admiral Bethava Rocwyn had Amps and Erso arrested for forgery and blackmailed Jyn into infiltrating the cell, promising amnesty in exchange for Jyn's espionage. However, Admiral Rocwyn broke her promise to Erso, arresting her along with the remainder of the group. Rocwyn stated that Blue would be executed for treason.
